component.ingredient_statement:
EITHER: Chicken Breast Meat (59%), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour (contains Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Vegetable Oils (Sunflower, Rapeseed), Breadcrumbs (Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour (contains Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Yeast, Salt), Water, Starch, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Semolina, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Spices (contain Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Salt, Raising Agents (Diphosphates, Sodium Carbonates), Natural Flavourings, Parsley, Whey Protein Concentrate (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Allergen Ingredient: MUSTARD Flour, Yeast Extract, Acid (Citric Acid), Spice Extract, Potassium Chloride.
OR: Chicken Breast Meat (59%), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour (contains Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Vegetable Oils (Sunflower, Rapeseed), Water, Breadcrumbs (Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Salt, Yeast), Starch, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Semolina, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Spices (contains Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Natural Flavouring, Salt, Yeast Extract, Raising Agent (Diphosphates, Sodium Carbonates), Parsley, Whey Protein Concentrate (Allergen Ingredient: from MILK), Acid (Citric Acid), Allergen Ingredient: MUSTARD Flour, Potassium Chloride, Spice Extract.
Prepared in the restaurant using a non-hydrogenated vegetable oil.

Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour (contains Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamine), Water, Allergen Ingredient: RYE Flour, Allergen Ingredient: Dried WHEAT Sourdough, Rapeseed Oil, Salt, Sugar, Dextrose, Yeast, Allergen Ingredient: BARLEY, Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid).
Potential Allergen Ingredient: N.B. May contain traces of sesame seeds* and milk.
*Please note all our buns, rolls, bagels, tortilla wraps and flatbreads are toasted in the same toaster as buns topped with sesame seeds.

Water, Glucose-Fructose Syrup, Sugar, Spirit Vinegar, Tomato Paste, Cane Molasses, Modified Maize Starch, Dried Glucose Syrup, Salt, Spices (contain Allergen Ingredient: MUSTARD), Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Smoke Flavourings.

item.description: Succulent chicken breast fillet in a crispy coating, with lettuce and smoky BBQ sauce, all in a warm, toasted bakehouse roll. Simply delicious.

footer.footer_name36: Allergy Advice: For allergens including cereals containing gluten see ingredients in BOLD
footer.footer_name41: We produce our food in kitchens where allergens are handled by our people, and where equipment and utensils are used for multiple menu items, including those containing allergens.  Although your meal is prepared with care, we cannot guarantee it will be allergen free, even after ingredients have been removed on request. While there are no nuts or peanut ingredients in the products listed we can’t guarantee that our food is completely nut or peanut free.

item.item_allergen: Celery, Gluten, Milk, Mustard, Wheat|May also contain Barley, May Contain Milk, May Contain Sesame Seeds, Rye.

item.item_meta_description: McDonald's Chicken Legend® with BBQ Sauce. 100% chicken breast meat in a crispy coating, with lettuce and BBQ sauce, in a warm, toasted bakehouse roll.
item.keywords: chicken legend with bbq sauce, chicken legend
